name: Star Diffusion
storyline: "Raynord requests for docking at Planet Xeno after completing a mission, but the answer he gets is nothing but silence.Raynord lands at the star port, then he finds out the port is not only in dark but also massive dead bodies of port staff.Meanwhile, Raynord's ship is damaged by unknown creatures.The ship is wrecked and the planet has gone weird, but what Raynord worries most is his beloved daughter Mira, who is still somewhere on the planet.Raynord has to find Mira, repair his ship and escape this no longer safe place."
